StateMachineAsl.title: The Statemachineasl Schema
examples: {"StartAt": "Is v-sync-api-operator Enabled? (%%STAGE_NAME%%)", "States": {"Is v-sync-api-operator Enabled? (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Choice", "Choices": [{"Variable": "$.Configuration.v-sync-api-operator.Enabled", "BooleanEquals": true, "Next": "Is v-sync-api-operator Media Type? (%%STAGE_NAME%%)"}], "Default": "v-sync-api-operator Not Started (%%STAGE_NAME%%)"}, "Is v-sync-api-operator Media Type? (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Choice", "Choices": [{"Variable": "$.Configuration.v-sync-api-operator.MediaType", "StringEquals": "Video", "Next": "Execute v-sync-api-operator (%%STAGE_NAME%%)"}], "Default": "v-sync-api-operator Not Started (%%STAGE_NAME%%)"}, "v-sync-api-operator Not Started (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Succeed"}, "Execute v-sync-api-operator (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Task", "Resource": "arn:aws:lambda:us-east-1:123456789123:function:miereset-TestWorkflow-1SYWUV3PP7FP1-video-test-sync", "ResultPath": "$.Outputs", "OutputPath": "$.Outputs", "Next": "Did v-sync-api-operator Complete (%%STAGE_NAME%%)", "Retry": [{"ErrorEquals": ["Lambda.ServiceException", "Lambda.AWSLambdaException", "Lambda.SdkClientException", "Lambda.Unknown", "MasExecutionError"], "IntervalSeconds": 2, "MaxAttempts": 2, "BackoffRate": 2}], "Catch": [{"ErrorEquals": ["States.ALL"], "Next": "v-sync-api-operator Failed (%%STAGE_NAME%%)", "ResultPath": "$.Outputs"}]}, "Did v-sync-api-operator Complete (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Choice", "Choices": [{"Variable": "$.Status", "StringEquals": "Complete", "Next": "v-sync-api-operator Succeeded (%%STAGE_NAME%%)"}], "Default": "v-sync-api-operator Failed (%%STAGE_NAME%%)"}, "v-sync-api-operator Failed (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Task", "End": True, "Resource": "%%OPERATION_FAILED_LAMBDA%%", "ResultPath": "$", "Retry": [{"ErrorEquals": ["Lambda.ServiceException", "Lambda.AWSLambdaException", "Lambda.SdkClientException", "Lambda.Unknown", "MasExecutionError"], "IntervalSeconds": 2, "MaxAttempts": 2, "BackoffRate": 2}]}, "v-sync-api-operator Succeeded (%%STAGE_NAME%%)": {"Type": "Succeed"}}}
